title: Crypto prices jump as Trump touts national crypto reserve - The Washington Post
description: Crypto prices jump as Trump touts national crypto reserve  The Washington PostTrump names cryptocurrencies in strategic reserve; prices spike  CNNBitcoin up after Trump names cryptocurrencies in strategic reserve  South China Morning PostTrump moves 'crypto strategic reserve' forward, promises to elevate industry  Fox BusinessCrypto Prices Jump After Trump Announces Five Tokens for Strategic Reserve  The Wall Street Journal

title: Bitcoin up by a fifth after Trump lists reserve tokens
description: Bitcoin and several other cryptocurrencies surged after U.S. President Trump announced plans to include them in a new strategic reserve. This news spurred a significant rally in crypto markets, with Bitcoin climbing over 20% from its recent lows and notable gains seen in ether, XRP, solana, and cardano.

title: Bitcoin jumps 20% as Trump reveals strategic crypto reserve
description: Bitcoin and ether will be at the heart of this reserve, Trump said

title: Crytocurrencies rally as Trump hypes up strategic reserve, Bitcoin briefly crosses $95K
